00057 #ifndef __CAN_H
00058 #define __CAN_H
00059 
00060 
00061 #ifndef __KERNEL__
00062 #include <sys/time.h>
00063 #endif
00064  /*---------- the can message structure */
00065 
00066 #define CAN_MSG_LENGTH 8                
00069 #define MSG_RTR         (1<<0)          
00070 #define MSG_OVR         (1<<1)          
00071 #define MSG_EXT         (1<<2)          
00072 #define MSG_PASSIVE     (1<<4)          
00073 #define MSG_BUSOFF      (1<<5)          
00074 #define MSG_            (1<<6)          
00075 #define MSG_BOVR        (1<<7)          
00079 #define MSG_ERR_MASK    (MSG_OVR + MSG_PASSIVE + MSG_BUSOFF + MSG_BOVR)
00080 
00086 typedef struct {
00088     int             flags;
00089     int             cob;         
00090     unsigned   long id;          
00091     struct timeval  timestamp;   
00092     short      int  length;      
00093     unsigned   char data[CAN_MSG_LENGTH]; 
00094 } canmsg_t;

00096 
00097 
00101 #define COMMAND          0      
00102 #define CONFIG           1      
00103 #define SEND             2      
00104 #define RECEIVE          3      
00105 #define CONFIGURERTR     4      
00106 #define STATUS           5      
00108 /*---------- CAN ioctl parameter types */
00109 
00112 typedef struct Command_par {
00113     int cmd;                    
00114     int error;                  
00115     unsigned long retval;       
00116 } Command_par_t ;
00117 
00118 
00121 typedef struct Config_par {
00122     int target;                 
00123     unsigned long val1;         
00124     unsigned long val2;         
00125     int error;                  
00126     unsigned long retval;       
00127 } Config_par_t ;
00128 
00131 typedef struct CanStatusPar { 
00132     unsigned int baud;                  
00133     unsigned int status;                
00134     unsigned int error_warning_limit;   
00135     unsigned int rx_errors;             
00136     unsigned int tx_errors;             
00137     unsigned int error_code;            
00138     unsigned int rx_buffer_size;        
00139     unsigned int rx_buffer_used;        
00140     unsigned int tx_buffer_size;        
00141     unsigned int tx_buffer_used;        
00142     unsigned long retval;               
00143     unsigned int type;                  
00144 } CanStatusPar_t;

00148 #define CAN_TYPE_UNSPEC         0
00149 #define CAN_TYPE_SJA1000        1
00150 #define CAN_TYPE_FlexCAN        2
00151 #define CAN_TYPE_TouCAN         3
00152 #define CAN_TYPE_82527          4
00153 #define CAN_TYPE_TwinCAN        5

00158 typedef struct Send_par {
00159     canmsg_t *Tx;               
00160     int error;                  
00161     unsigned long retval;       
00162 } Send_par_t ;
00163 
00166 typedef struct Receive_par {
00167     canmsg_t *Rx;               
00168     int error;                  
00169     unsigned long retval;       
00170 } Receive_par_t ;

00175     unsigned message;           
00176     canmsg_t *Tx;               
00177     int error;                  
00178     unsigned long retval;       
00179 } ConfigureRTR_par_t ;

00184 # define CMD_START      1
00185 # define CMD_STOP       2
00186 # define CMD_RESET      3

00192 # define CONF_ACC       0       /* mask and code */
00193 # define CONF_ACCM      1       /* mask only */
00194 # define CONF_ACCC      2       /* code only */
00195 # define CONF_TIMING    3       /* bit timing */
00196 # define CONF_OMODE     4       /* output control register */
